title: Aarya: Emerald and Diamond Nakshi Bangles - Vanki Style
features: Openable 'Vanki' style bangles featuring intricate Nakshi work depicting floral and vine motifs. Embellished with meticulously set emeralds and diamonds, with a focus on symmetry and detail. The bangle showcases exquisite craftsmanship and a delicate antique gold finish.
colors: Predominantly golden yellow with green emerald accents and sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: and grand celebrations. The Vanki design is also suitable for special occasions and cultural events.
description: These bangles represent the pinnacle of Hyderabadi craftsmanship, blending traditional Nakshi artistry with the brilliance of emeralds and diamonds. The Vanki design is symbolic of prosperity and good fortune. The high-quality gold ensures lasting beauty and value, making it a cherished heirloom.
